News + Updates

“Canada is a multicultural society, and this character is reflected in business, education, and various human endeavours and interactions. The stories from each community need to be told by those with better familiarity with their indigenous roots. We in the design community need to do our part and enable our aspiring visual storytellers to tell their stories and reverse the effects of unintended marginalisation.”

— ‘Segun Olude CGD, designer and art director'
